channel.title: Where do i put the code
channel.description: I have a code! ::jail where do i put it? i go in too source (my server) and go to client and putted the code there and compiled i got 12 errors ... didnt work

item.title: Where do i put the code
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code=php]
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

	if (otherPIndex != -1) {
		client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		p.teleportX = ####; //X coordinates
		p.teleportY = ####; //Y Coordinates
		p.action = 1;
		p.sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sendMessage("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");

	} else { 
		sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
	[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Where do i put the code
item.dc:creator: @laka laka
item.description:
@laka wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:359397”][quote author=laka link=topic=455853.msg3337347#msg3337347 date=1284060531]

1.) we know what a source is
2.) you are suppose to find on of you commands like if you have a ::home search home then under it paste your code make sure it has } under and above it
3. it would help to see your errors
4. would be nice to see your code…

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2994; c.teleportToY = 3365; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”); c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

…

i cant write my errors they are in cmd…
[/quote]

thanks for ripping my code:x

and it goes in the client.java in server[/quote]

You mean client, ok i putted in the client i still get errors i said from the begginning ! where in client i gonna put it? i use nullpkz source

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

Well, this isn’t a spoonfeeding community but I can tell you that you probably took the code from a source different than the one you have, and none of the things in the code are defined in your source.
